column1: Local Foods////I had the kale and quinoa as sides
column2: but I didn't get all the hoopla about the kale.  I prefer creamier kale salads
column3: and this one bored me a bit.  The quinoa was delicious though!  And my friend's garbanzo bean salad was tasty
column4: so I'd check that out next time.  The butterscotch brownie was more of a blondie reminiscent of pecan pie.  Good
